response.overview: This documentary tells/explains the pelebon of a pair of sulinggih in this Corona pandemic situation, the difference between pelebon/cremation as usual in Bali, with pelebon/cremation during the pandemic, especially corpses that have been exposed to covid. Then they found and used a very unique, simple method, a method very rarely used by Balinese people to carry out pelebon, namely using Tirta Prenawa Pengawak Solas. This film also inserts a "little" love story of a husband and wife until death picks them up. The couple had made a promise that the husband would die first. However, the wife did not keep her promise and died first. The husband felt disappointed, devastated, and sad because the wife did not keep her promise. Because their love is so strong that they are not separated from each other, the husband is "trusted" to "let go" of himself and then follow his wife.
response.title: Pelebon Ring Pandemi
